content.description:
Pliny’s Compliment to a Friend

Bene fecisti quod libertum aliquandoaliquando, adv.: once tibi carum 
epistulis meis in domum in animum recepisti. 
Iuvabit hoc te; me certe iuvat, quod te tam tractabilemtractabilis, -e, adj.: manageable 
video ut in tua ira regi possis.
content.question: In lines 3-4 (Iuvabit...possis), it can be inferred that Pliny is happy that the recipient has been able to

choices.label: call for a punishment when necessary
take the initiative in a complicated situation
act compassionately while managing their anger
provide assistance to Pliny when it was requested

content.answer: act compassionately while managing their anger
